original_text: Those men brought all the Levites together. They all made themselves clean to serve the Lord. Then they went into the temple to make it a holy place again, as the king had commanded them. They obeyed the Lord's command.
korean_text: 그들이 그들의 형제들을 모아 성결하게 하고 들어가서 왕이 여호와의 말씀대로 명령한 것을 따라 여호와의 전을 깨끗하게 할새

sentences.original_text: Those men brought all the Levites together
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 모든 레위 사람들을 모았습니다

sentences.original_text: They all made themselves clean to serve the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주를 섬기기 위해 자신들을 정결케 했습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they went into the temple
to make it a holy place again
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳을 다시 거룩한 곳으로 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: as the king had commanded them
